original_title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East) - Castle Hill Avenue
text:
2201 and 2217 East Tremont Ave., at, and adjoining the N.E. corner of Castle Hill Ave. The 2 and 1/2 -story frame house, seen across the roof of the 1-story structure faces on the south side of Poplar St., and bears
No. 2210 thereon.
July 1, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

(1)
Odell Street, east side, north of Archer Street (vantage-point). The view is northeastward toward St. Raymonds Roman Catholic Church (center background), at E. Tremont and Castle Hill Avenues. This area was later developed as part of the huge housing project erected by the Metropolitan Life Insurance Company.

P. L. Sperr

(2)
A closer view of part of the area seen in view 1.

April 10, 1938.

P. L. Sperr

(1)
Odell Street, east side, north of Archer Street (vantage-point). The view is northeastward toward St. Raymonds Roman Catholic Church (center background), at E. Tremont and Castle Hill Avenues.
